Package cc.jayv.monopoly3

Class GameLogicController

java.lang.Object
cc.jayv.monopoly3.GameLogicController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameLogicController extends Object implements Serializable
Controls game logic and updates data within the Board accordingly.

    • appendToGameLog

      public void appendToGameLog(String input)
      Append the input to the game log as a formatted line.
      Entries are prefixed with the current date and time, as well as the current turn number.
      Parameters:
      input - The contents of the message.

    • sendInitGameMessage

      public void sendInitGameMessage()
      Send a message to the game log when the game has started, including information about the number of players specified.

    • initialEvaluator

      public void initialEvaluator()
      Evaluator which is run at the beginning of a player's turn.
      Implements which decision path to execute given the player's condition.

    • diceRollManager

      public void diceRollManager()
      Manager which is executed when the current player rolls the dice.
      Note: this does not execute for special dice roll conditions, such as rolling for doubles when jailed, or rolling to determine the rent paid when landing on an owned Utility.
